item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Receive this blessing as you go forth this day: “May the Lord bless you and keep you; may the Lord make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you; may the Lord lift up his countenance upon you and give you peace.” Numbers 6:24" -- Anonymous

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Neil Anderson
item.description: "The more you reaffirm who you are in Christ, the more your behavior will being to reflect your true identity." -- Neil Anderson

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I am a better person when I have less on my plate." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "There’s a crack (or cracks) in everyone…that’s how the light of God gets in." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Beth Pattillo
item.description: "I’m quiet for a long moment, and Velva just sits with me, waiting. She’s good at that. Just being a companion, not pushing or prodding, but waiting as if she has all the time in the world. Why is it that a woman of 94, who probably has very little time left, can be far more patient that an woman of 30 who has a lot of years ahead of her?" -- Beth Pattillo

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rikki Klieman
item.description: "And every night before I went to bed, my mother would stroke my forehead, pat the dog who was cuddled in the crook of my knees, and ask, ‘Rikki, what are you thankful for today?’ And each night I would have to give that question some thought and find an answer." -- Rikki Klieman

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Look for God. Look for God like a man with his head on fire looks for water." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Francine Rivers
item.description: "Beloved, surrender wholeheartedly to Jesus Christ, who loves you. As you drink from the deep well of Scripture, the Lord will refresh you and cleanse you, mold you and re-create you through His Living Word. For the Bible is the very breath of God, giving life eternal to those who seek Him." -- Francine Rivers
